title: Katy Perry releases new music video for Harleys in Hawaii
text:
Katy Perry is letting go of her California Gurl status and trading it in for motorcycles and leather jackets for her new song Harleys In Hawaii.

In the song and music video that were both released on Wednesday, the singer is seen hopping on a motorcycle and getting steamy with her lover in Hawaii.

This is her third single off of her rumored forthcoming album following her previous songs Never Really Over and Small Talk.

New music! Katy Perry's new music video and song was released on Wednesday for her latest single, Harleys in Hawaii

In Hawaii: The music video was filmed in Hawaii and tells the story of Katy falling in love and enjoying her time with her love while on the island

The video starts off with the 34-year-old on a motorcycle riding through the streets of the island wearing a black leather jacket full of patches that say things like 'ride or die' while sporting a burnt orange helmet with a yellow star on the side.

She then stops at a bar where a man catches her eye as she sips on a breezy island drink before grabbing the microphone and singing along to the music.

That's when the love affair begins and the scene switches to the two getting close on the beach and making out in the water.

The look: She wore a black leather jacket full of patches that say things like 'ride or die' while sporting a burnt orange helmet with a yellow star on the side

Get into the groove: The I Kissed A Girl hitmaker closes her eyes as she sings along

Mystery man: The man on the motorcycle that catches Katy's eye who is inspired by her fiancé Orlando Bloom

Falling in love: After the two meet in the bar they are seen getting close in the water

So much intimacy: In many scenes she is kissing the beared fellow

Coming on a bit strong Katy! In this scene she her mouth open as she goes in for the kiss

Throughout the video we see the two grow closer together and share intimate moments at various parts of their little getaway.

At one point the two are cuddling in bed while the This Is How We Do singer wears a white blouse and blue underwear.

And towards the end, Katy hops on the back of the motorcycle cycle with her new beau and even gets a little risky as she lets go and puts her hands out while riding on the back while her lover drives.

Scoping out: In the beginning of the video, she's sitting on the beach with some friends while looking out at the water

Love: Katy wears a bright red one piece bathing suit while wrapping her arms around the mystery biker guy

They just can't keep their hands off each other: Here she holds his face as she looks down on the tattooed wonder

Back in July, she opened up while on a radio show about the inspiration behind the track and how it came from her vacation with none other than her fiancé Orlando Bloom when they were in Oahu.

'We were in Hawaii [shooting American Idol] and we went and rented a Harley,' she told the Zach Sang Show.

'To be on the back of a motorcycle in Hawaii with the air blowing on your face is so beautiful. It was awesome. I can remember specifically where I was, the street corner I was on in Oahu, turning that corner and whispering to Orlando: 'I'm going to write a song called 'Harleys in Hawaii,' and I did. It just dropped into my head.'

Relatable: In a couple scenes, Katy is seen hanging out with friends in a room while she lays down and munches on some hot Cheetos

Steamy: The two lovers roll around and cuddle while hanging out as Katy sports a white blouse and blue underwear

What is she up to? Katy puts her hands up as she gets close to her new beau
